EPH 3.8 mis, þamma undarleijin allaize þize weihane, atgibana warþ ansts so, in þiudom wailamerjan þo unfairlaistidon gabein Xristaus, ... EPH 3.9 in guda þamma alla gaskapjandin, EPH 3.10 ei kanniþ wesi nu reikjam jah waldufnjam in þaim himinakundam þairh aikklesjon so filufaiho handugei gudis, EPH 3.11 bi muna aiwe þanei gatawida in Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma, EPH 3.12 in þammei habam balþein jah atgagg in trauainai þairh galaubein is.
ni wairþaiþ usgrudjans in aglom meinaim faur izwis, þatei ist wulþus izwar.

EPH 3.14 in þis biuga kniwa meina du attin fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, EPH 3.15 us þammei all fadreinis in himina jah ana airþai namnjada, EPH 3.16 ei gibai izwis bi gabein wulþaus seinis mahtai inswinþjan þairh ahman seinana in innuman mannan, EPH 3.17 bauan Xristu þairh galaubein in hairtam izwaraim, EPH 3.18 ei in frijaþwai gawaurhtai jah gasulidai mageiþ gafahan miþ allaim þaim weiham ƕa sijai braidei jallaggei jah hauhei jah diupei; EPH 3.19 kunnan þo ufarassau mikilon þis kunþjis frijaþwa Xristaus, ei fulnaiþ in allai fullon gudis.
EPH 3.20 aþþan þamma mahteigin ufar all taujan maizo þau bidjam aiþþau fraþjam bi mahtai þizai waurkjandein in unsis, EPH 3.21 immuh wulþus in Xristau Iesu jah aikklesjon in allos aldins aiwe, amen.

EPH 4.1 Bidja nu izwis ik bandja in fraujin, wairþaba gaggan þizos laþonais þizaiei laþodai siuþ, EPH 4.2 miþ allai hauneinai jah qairrein, miþ usbeisnai usþulandans izwis misso in frijaþwai, EPH 4.3 usdaudjandans fastan ainamundiþa ahmins in gabundjai gawairþeis.
EPH 4.4 ain leik jah ains ahma, swaswe atlaþodai sijuþ in aina wen laþonais izwaraizos.
EPH 4.5 ains frauja, aina galaubeins, aina daupeins,
EPH 4.6 ains guþ jah atta allaize, saei ufar allaim jah and allans jah in allaim uns.
EPH 4.7 iþ ainƕarjammeh unsara atgibana ist ansts bi mitaþ gibos Xristaus;
ussteigands in hauhiþa ushanþ hunþ jah at-gaf-uh gibos mannam.
EPH 4.9 þat-uþ-þan usstaig, ƕa ist, niba þatei jah atstaig faurþis in undaristo airþos?
EPH 4.10 saei atstaig, sa ist jah saei usstaig ufar allans himinans, ei usfullidedi allata.

EPH 4.11 jah silba gaf sumans apaustauluns, sumanz-uþ-þan praufetuns, sumans-uþ-þan aiwaggelistans, sumans-uþ-þan hairdjans jah laisarjans, EPH 4.12 du ustauhtai weihaize du waurstwa andbahtjis, du timreinai leikis Xristaus, EPH 4.13 unte garinnaima allai in ainamundiþa galaubeinais jah ufkunþjis sunus gudis, du waira fullamma, in mitaþ wahstaus fullons Xristaus, EPH 4.14 ei þanaseiþs ni sijaima niuklahai uswagidai jah uswalugidai winda ƕammeh laiseinais, liutein manne, in filudeisein du listeigon uswandjai airzeins, EPH 4.15 iþ sunja taujandans in frijaþwai wahsjaima in ina þo alla, ize ist haubiþ, Xristus, EPH 4.16 us þammei all leik gagatiloþ jah gagahaftiþ þairh allos gawissins andstaldis, bi waurstwa in mitaþ ana ainƕarjoh fero, uswahst leikis taujiþ du timreinai seinai in frijaþwai.

EPH 4.17 þata nu qiþa jah weitwodja in fraujin, ei þanaseiþs ni gaggaiþ, swaswe jah anþaros þiudos gaggand in uswissja hugis seinis, EPH 4.18 riqizeinai gahugdai wisandans, framaþjai libainais gudis in unwitjis þis wisandins in im, in daubiþos hairtane seinaize, EPH 4.19 þaiei uswenans waurþanai sik silbans atgebun aglaitein in waurstwein unhrainiþos allaizos, in faihufrikein.

EPH 4.20 iþ jus ni swa ganemuþ Xristu, EPH 4.21 jabai sweþauh ina hausideduþ jah in imma uslaisidai sijuþ, swaswe ist sunja in Iesu, EPH 4.22 ei aflagjaiþ jus bi frumin usmeta þana fairnjan mannan þana riurjan bi lustum afmarzeinais. EPH 4.23 an-niujaiþ-uþ-þan ahmin fraþjis izwaris, EPH 4.24 jaggahamoþ þamma niujin mann þamma bi guda gaskapanin in garaihtein jah weihiþai sunjos.
